name: Spider Lander
description: A loving echo of games from the 80's and familiar to those who loved classics such as Lunar Rescue and Lunar Lander. Swing on a thread from your mothership and thrust safely down to rescue some of those poor guys on the planet, then try to escape safely.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: I3 Level Memory: 4 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I3 Level Memory: 8 MB RAM DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space
